title: Ambient Video Game Music - Science Fiction 4
description: Return to the vast, enigmatic expanse of the future with our follow-up collection of 10 science fiction-themed ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Return to the vast, enigmatic expanse of the future with our follow-up collection of 10 science fiction-themed ambience tracks. This sequel builds upon the intricate soundscapes of the original, continuing our exploration into the extraordinary and unknown, making them a perfect fit for any sci-fi game environment.


This collection delves deeper into the sonorous universe of science fiction, bringing forth an array of new, meticulously crafted tracks that capture everything from the otherworldly serenity of alien landscapes, to the pulsating energy of spaceship command centres, and the haunting isolation of the endless void.


Each track in this collection has been thoughtfully composed to stand alone, allowing game developers greater flexibility in their application. Just like its predecessor, the collection includes a special unifying track. It's a unique piece that provides a thematic thread through the diverse sci-fi settings, whether used to enhance other tracks or stand independently to adapt to various in-game scenarios.


These tracks encapsulate the thrill, mystery, and grandeur of science fiction. They're perfect for supporting epic space explorations, time-bending adventures, or intense interstellar conflicts. The vibrant soundscapes are a testament to the intricate worlds of the future, promising to add depth and dimension to your game's atmosphere.

With this sequel, game developers have an even richer palette of sounds to draw from, allowing for the creation of immersive and diverse worlds that will captivate players and enhance the overall gaming experience.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
